text: Michael Thomas Roarke (November 8, 1930 â€“ July 27, 2019) was an American catcher and coach in Major League Baseball. He threw and batted right-handed. He stood tall and weighed . Roarke played for the Detroit Tigers, St. Louis Cardinals and the San Diego Padres. Roarke died on July 27, 2019 in West Warwick, Rhode Island at the age of 88.West Warwick native Mike Roarke, former MLB player and coach, dies at 88 ==References== ==Other websites== , or Retrosheet, or SABR Biography Project Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American military personnel of the Korean War Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:St. Louis Cardinals players Category:San Diego Padres players Category:Sportspeople from Rhode Island Category:People from West Warwick, Rhode Island Category:Military people from Rhode Island
title: Mike Roarke
